name: Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings.
– all drawings are the latest revision.
Record of conformity - Drawings and drawing registers
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Acceptance Criteria - All necessary measures and controls being implemented, that is PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP
Reference Documents - PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
1.3 - Definition of the work area & survey check
Acceptance Criteria - Work area has been cleared and surveyed (marked on site). Work area to be clearly defined as per For Construction drawings prior to trenching and install.
○ Ensure excavation permit obtained and (if required) services in work(s) area isolated.
Reference Documents - IFC Drawings, Excavation Permit
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Dig zone marked out and excavation undergone in accordance to relevant permit. Pit placed and levelled as per survey set out.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed, Avionics SIT Pit Installation checklist
Acceptance Criteria - Primary, secondary and earth conduits (and subsoil outlet) positioned in pit according to IFC drawings.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed, Avionics SIT Pit Installation checklist
2.3 - Bedding and backfill of pit surrounds
Acceptance Criteria - Each pit shall be bedded and backfilled with stabilised sand.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed, Avionics SIT Pit Installation checklist
Acceptance Criteria - Pits shall be labelled and directional markers placed. Lids to be secured and area cleaned/demolished.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed, Avionics SIT Pit Installation checklist
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
